member.name: T:InMindAcademy.Lab10.Tala.StringFormatter
member.summary: Provides string formatting utilities for converting between different casing styles

member.name: M:InMindAcademy.Lab10.Tala.StringFormatter.ToPascalCase(System.String)
member.summary: Converts a string to PascalCase (each word starts with uppercase, no separators)

member.name: M:InMindAcademy.Lab10.Tala.StringFormatter.ToCamelCase(System.String)
member.summary: Converts a string to camelCase (first word starts with lowercase, rest with uppercase, no separators)

member.name: M:InMindAcademy.Lab10.Tala.StringFormatter.ToSnakeCase(System.String)
member.summary: Converts a string to snake_case (all lowercase with underscore separators)

member.name: M:InMindAcademy.Lab10.Tala.StringFormatter.ToKebabCase(System.String)
member.summary: Converts a string to kebab-case (all lowercase with hyphen separators)

member.name: T:InMindAcademy.Lab10.Tala.StringStatistics
member.summary: Provides utilities for analyzing text and generating statistics

member.name: M:InMindAcademy.Lab10.Tala.StringStatistics.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Initialize a new StringStatistics instance with the given text

member.name: P:InMindAcademy.Lab10.Tala.StringStatistics.CharacterCount
member.summary: Gets the total character count of the text

member.name: P:InMindAcademy.Lab10.Tala.StringStatistics.CharacterCountWithoutWhitespace
member.summary: Gets the total character count excluding whitespace

member.name: P:InMindAcademy.Lab10.Tala.StringStatistics.WordCount
member.summary: Gets the word count in the text

member.name: P:InMindAcademy.Lab10.Tala.StringStatistics.SentenceCount
member.summary: Gets the sentence count in the text

member.name: P:InMindAcademy.Lab10.Tala.StringStatistics.WordFrequency
member.summary: Gets a dictionary of words and their frequencies

member.name: P:InMindAcademy.Lab10.Tala.StringStatistics.MostCommonWord
member.summary: Gets the most common word in the text

member.name: P:InMindAcademy.Lab10.Tala.StringStatistics.LeastCommonWord
member.summary: Gets the least common word in the text

member.name: P:InMindAcademy.Lab10.Tala.StringStatistics.AverageWordLength
member.summary: Gets the average word length in the text

member.name: M:InMindAcademy.Lab10.Tala.StringStatistics.GetTextReport
member.summary: Returns a comprehensive statistical report of the text
